title: Podere Marzuolo
description: Podere Marzuolo was the site of Roman pottery production from the first century B.C. until the early fourth century A.D. The site has yielded evidence for the production of terra sigillata pottery as well as evidence of blacksmithing.

properties.description: Coordinates following GeoNames. The archaeological site lies within the boundaries of the modern comune.
